titleStmt.title: A letter lately sent by a reverend bishop from the Tovver, to a private friend and by him thought fit to be published.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
H. S.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 6: Jo: Norvic., i.e. Joseph Hall.
In defence of his conduct in the diocese of Norwich.
With a reply from the friend signed: H.S.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
